text: Márton Fucsovics and Hsieh Cheng-peng were the defending champions, but Hsieh did not enter the junior competition this year. Fucsovics played alongside Máté Zsiga, but the team lost to Guilherme Clézar and Tiago Fernandes in the second round. Duilio Beretta and Roberto Quiroz defeated Oliver Golding and Jiří Veselý 6–1, 7–5 in the final. == Seeds == # Márton Fucsovics / Máté Zsiga (Second Round) # Renzo Olivo / Agustín Velotti (First Round) # Duilio Beretta / Roberto Quiroz (Champions) # Oliver Golding / Jiří Veselý (Final) 5. Juan Sebastián Gómez / Yasutaka Uchiyama (First Round) 6. Damir Džumhur / Mate Pavić (Quarterfinals) 7. Denis Kudla / Raymond Sarmiento (First Round) 8. Huang Liang-chi / Ouyang Bowen (Second Round) == Draw == === Finals === === Top Half === === Bottom Half === ==Other websites== * Official site of US Open Boys' Doubles
title: 2010 US Open – Boys' Doubles
